name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Solutions Engineer with 13+ years of expertise focusing on AI solutions and high-performance application development. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Git**, with a solid understanding of **REST API** implementations. Demonstrated ability to leverage **N8N** for process automation and integration across platforms.

Skilled in building complex, AI-driven systems that enhance operational efficiencies and predictive capabilities. Adept at cultivating solutions that require strong problem-solving skills and creativity, alongside a proven track record of empathy and proactivity in collaborative environments. Experienced in developing applications within the **healthcare** and **financial** sectors while ensuring compliance with industry regulations.

Hands-on expertise in a diverse **tech stack** including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Knowledgeable in deploying cloud-native solutions via **AWS** and **Azure**, while successfully implementing **microservices**, **event-driven architectures**, and CI/CD pipelines. Comprehensive understanding of MLOps principles utilizing **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** for effective model management.

experience.responsibilities:
Implemented innovative AI solutions in healthcare and finance to enhance user experience and operational efficiency.
Expertly utilized **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and REST API for developing scalable full-stack applications that align with business needs.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams, showcasing strong problem-solving skills to address complex challenges and drive effective solutions.
Designed and built platforms using **FastAPI**, **Node.js**, and modern front-end frameworks such as **React (17–18)** and **Vue 3**, ensuring compliance with industry standards.
Led the development of mobile applications for **iOS** and **Android** using **Flutter** and **React Native**, managing state with **Provider** and **Redux** to enhance user interactions.
Engineered CI/CD pipelines using **Fastlane** and **App Center**, integrating test automation and release workflows that reduced deployment times by **30%**.
Transformed legacy systems into microservices architectures using **Docker** and **Kubernetes (AKS/EKS)**, enabling scalable and fault-tolerant deployments.
Maintained robust data infrastructure with **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, and **Redis**, optimizing data handling for over **1 million** transactions daily.
Deployed ML models for tasks like risk scoring and fraud detection through frameworks such as **scikit-learn** and **PyTorch**, contributing to a **20%** increase in fraud detection accuracy.
Implemented MLOps workflows leveraging **MLflow**, **DVC**, and **Airflow** for seamless model training and validation across environments.
Integrated intelligent features into applications, enhancing customer engagement with predictive health alerts, utilizing **Azure ML** and **AWS Sagemaker**.
Built effective DevOps pipelines using **GitHub Actions** and **CircleCI**, achieving a **40%** improvement in deployment velocity through automation.
Developed advanced data visualization tools with **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded** for real-time analysis and reporting of critical KPIs.
Collaborated with ML teams to deploy NLP models using **spaCy** and **Hugging Face Transformers**, streamlining document processing through secured REST APIs.
Defined comprehensive testing strategies with **Jest**, **Cypress**, and **Postman**, ensuring quality across **100%** of the codebase with unit and E2E tests.
Enhanced search capabilities with **Azure Cognitive Search** and **Elasticsearch**, enabling rapid queries across diverse datasets.

Utilized **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** to modernize core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture using **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, enhancing scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
Leveraged **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **Redux Toolkit** to build interactive front-end applications, creating sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels with **Tailwind CSS**.
Implemented **REST API** for delivering real-time analytics dashboards with **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies.
Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows such as payments, alerts, and compliance.
Developed ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time processing across **9** critical data sources.
Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns, improving detection rates by **30%**.
Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services, achieving a response time of under **500ms** for scoring transactions.

Utilized **Git** for version control, ensuring seamless collaboration and code management across a team of **9** developers in enhancing platform features and addressing issues promptly.
Developed efficient **REST APIs** facilitating secure data exchange and integration across multiple services, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills for complex integration challenges.
Employed **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** in designing robust frontend applications, leveraging creativity to deliver engaging user experiences while optimizing performance metrics by **25%**.
Implemented automated workflows with **N8N** to streamline processes, enhancing operational efficiency and enabling proactive responses to system demands.
Integrated AI-driven solutions to optimize business processes, employing **AI** techniques to personalize user engagement and improve overall user satisfaction ratings by **15%**.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams, displaying empathy and understanding of client needs to tailor solutions that exceed expectations.
Exercised proactive strategies in identifying potential issues and implementing innovative solutions, significantly reducing downtime by **30%** during peak traffic periods.
Managed deployment processes and version control effectively, leveraging **MCP** for continuous integration and delivery in the development lifecycle. 
Fostered a collaborative, creative environment that encouraged team members to contribute ideas and solutions, improving the overall output and innovation of the team.
